nodes.name: Set Input Parameters
nodes.notes:
Device lifecycle management parameters:
- method: HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
- lifecycleId: Specific lifecycle record ID
- deviceId: Filter by device
- status: Filter by lifecycle status (pending, in-progress, completed, failed)
- stage: Filter by lifecycle stage (discovery, provisioning, deployment, decommission)
- body: JSON body for POST/PUT operations

nodes.name: Build Query String
nodes.notes: Constructs query parameters for lifecycle filtering

parameters.url: ={{ $env.GLUWARE_API_URL }}/lifecycle{{ $('Build Query String').item.json.lifecycleId ? '/' + $('Build Query String').item.json.lifecycleId : '' }}{{ $('Build Query String').item.json.queryString || '' }}

nodes.name: GET Lifecycle
nodes.notes:
Retrieves lifecycle information:
- All lifecycle records or specific by ID
- Filter by device, status, or stage

nodes.name: POST/PUT/DELETE Lifecycle
nodes.notes:
Lifecycle operations:
- POST: Initiate new lifecycle process
- PUT: Update lifecycle stage/status
- DELETE: Cancel lifecycle process

nodes.name: Validate Input
nodes.notes: Validates lifecycle status, stage, and required fields
